top_comment.text:
So damned hard to hope for something you know won't ever happen. To be 
honest my darlings, i'm soooo mad at you all! Feel like you let your fans 
down... even tho i know it was the hardest for you guys, i just can't 
forgive you. Until you won't show me i'm wrong and come back, shown a sign, 
give hope for us.
Daniel, i don't know where you are, if You still ever think about your 
fans, but i just want you to know that we're STILL WAITING for you to come 
back. No matter what happened, we just want to see you on stage again!!!!
Dari, Jeesu i'm so glad for your solo.
But to be honest, i loved you in the group of DMTN. Just can't get over the 
past...
So many years passed by...
Whenever i think about you, i remember of E.R's lyrics, which totally fits 
to my feelings toward this band right now..
"Your empty seat is as if a storm passed by and took everything"... don't 
you remember my loves?:|
And we're still waiting, DON'T FORGET ABOUT US!!! LoveYouAll.<3﻿

top_comment.text:
I actually came across this in my recommendations. Who are these guys and 
the description says they have a new name. What were they known as before? 
(I know I could look this all up, but I'd rather hear from their fans.)﻿
top_comment.author: LigerPanther

comments.text:
+Sads626 It's a damn shame to see talent go to waste like that. Just 
because they're on an indefinite hiatus doesn't mean that I can't buy and 
enjoy the music they left behind; and I'll keep an eye on them in case 
something comes up for them. Thanks for the quick DMTN lesson; it was much 
appreciated. ^^
comments.author: LigerPanther

comments.text:
Not really a new name. They debuted as Dalmatian. After a military 
conscription and the departure of a member, the group changed their image 
from happy to more mature and serious thus made a psuedo acronym of 
Dalmatian i.e. DMTN, which also doubles as an acronym Desire Motivation 
Timing Now. The group isn't new (they debuted in 2010) but they never took 
off as every year something happened. Lineup change, drug scandal etc.... 
so the group is on indefinite hiatus last time I checked. They might have 
disbanded as jisu (guy in 2:09-2:10) is a trainee for Kim Tae Woo's label 
and set to redebut by the end of this year.
comments.author: Sads626

top_comment.text: waiting for Daniel hyung to get out of jail...﻿
